pullrequest.title: Port SDF Filesystem to Ignition Common

content.raw: `exists` 192af04, `isDirectory` 1d3b18e, and `cwd` b28e9a3 implementations have been replaced with the ported boost code. `removeDirectory`, `absPath`, and `createDirectories` are unchanged because they didn't already exist in the ported boost code, and without a windows CI job I won't be sure any changes to them are working. I can create an issue to revisit them on windows.
content.html: exists 192af04, isDirectory 1d3b18e, and cwd b28e9a3 implementations have been replaced with the ported boost code. removeDirectory, absPath, and createDirectories are unchanged because they didn't already exist in the ported boost code, and without a windows CI job I won't be sure any changes to them are working. I can create an issue to revisit them on windows.
